xwikidoc.name: ListTables

xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #if($hasProgramming) #set($sqlTools = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage('SQLTools.SQLToolsGroovy')) = Form = $sqlTools.getForm($request, $doc, true, false) #if($request.url) #set($connection = $sqlTools.getConnectionFromRequest($request)) #set($results = $sqlTools.getTables($connection)) = Table of content = {{toc /}}
= Tables = $results #end #else {{error}}Sorry, you need the programming rights to use this tool{{/error}} #end {{/velocity}}
